mapper.select: select m.material_id as materialId, m.title, v.view_time as time, u.nickname, (COALESCE(c.comment_count,0) * 3 + COALESCE(d.download_count,0) * 5 + COALESCE(view.view_count,0) * 1 + COALESCE(s.star_count,0) * 8) as score from view_history v join materials m on m.material_id = v.material_id join users u on u.user_id = m.user_id left join (select material_id, count(*) as comment_count from comments group by material_id) c on v.material_id = c.material_id left join (select material_id, count(*) as download_count from downloads group by material_id) d on v.material_id = d.material_id left join (select material_id, count(*) as view_count from view_history group by material_id) view on view.material_id = v.material_id left join (select material_id, count(*) as star_count from stars group by material_id) s on v.material_id = s.material_id where v.user_id=#{userId}
